unnormalised: Someone asked me about common neuro problems faced in India. Well, neurological disorders are quite prevalent here, and early detection is key.
normalised: Someone asked me about common neuro problems faced in India. Well, neurological disorders are quite prevalent here, and early detection is key.

unnormalised: One common issue is stroke. Sadly, many cases go unreported or reach the hospital late (after the "golden hour," 4.5 hrs from symptom onset). We see a lot of ischemic strokes. Also, epilepsy is quite common. Many patients consult doctors only after multiple seizures. Then there's migraines, affecting a significant portion of the population, especially women. Did you know? Rural areas often lack specialized neuro care, leading to delayed diagnosis and treatment for diseases like Parkinson's & Alzheimer's. I'd strongly recommend consulting a neurophysician asap if you experience any of these symptoms.
normalised: One common issue is stroke. Sadly, many cases go unreported or reach the hospital late (after the "golden hour," four point five hours from symptom onset). We see a lot of ischemic strokes. Also, epilepsy is quite common. Many patients consult doctors only after multiple seizures. Then there is migraines, affecting a significant portion of the population, especially women. Did you know? Rural areas often lack specialized neuro care, leading to delayed diagnosis and treatment for diseases like Parkinson's and Alzheimer's. I would strongly recommend consulting a neurophysician as soon as possible if you experience any of these symptoms.
